dataList.name: Pacchetto Fornitura Stagione 6
dataList.desc:
Disponibile per l'acquisto solo durante la Stagione 6. Il pacchetto contiene i seguenti articoli:

· Follia Pagata x5040
· Biglietto per Decaestrazione x3
· Biglietto per Addestramento Identità IV x60
· Biglietto per Addestramento Identità x30
· Filo x80
· [Stagione 6] Cassa di ScheggieEgo A Scelta x40

dataList.name:
Full Moon 2025
Commemorative
ID Upgrade Pack
dataList.desc:
A limited Full Moon 2025 Campaign Commemorative Pack. Contains the following items:

· Takeoff Module - ID Uptie x1
· Identity Training Ticket IV x140

※ Using the Takeoff Module - ID Uptie raises the selected Identity's Uptie Tier to 4.

dataList.name:
Full Moon 2025
Commemorative
E.G.O Upgrade Pack
dataList.desc:
A limited Full Moon 2025 Campaign Commemorative Pack. Contains the following items:

· Decaextraction Ticket x3
· Takeoff Module - E.G.O Spinning [WAW] x1

※ Using the Takeoff Module - E.G.O Spinning [WAW] raises the selected E.G.O's Threadspinning tier to 4. (Usable only on E.G.Os WAW Level or lower)

dataList.name:
Full Moon 2025
Commemorative
Complete Pack
dataList.desc:
A limited Full Moon 2025 Campaign Commemorative Pack. Contains the following items:

· Decaextraction Ticket x4
· Takeoff Module - ID Uptie x1
· Takeoff Module - E.G.O Spinning [WAW] x1
· Identity Training Ticket IV x140
· Threads x100

※ Using the Takeoff Module - ID Uptie raises the selected Identity's Uptie Tier to 4.

※ Using the Takeoff Module - E.G.O Spinning [WAW] raises the selected E.G.O's Threadspinning tier to 4. (Usable only on E.G.Os WAW Level or lower)
